Name: Average time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants containing both activities
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to occur after Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation in variants that include a complete reviewer assignment path
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time until SW-Reviewer Agreed is performed following Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation, considering only cases that reach the peer review stage
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Elapsed time between Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants where no reviewer reminders (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 or 2) were issued
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time for the sequence Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation → Manuscript Export Succeeded → Plagiarism Originality Report Completed → SW-Checklist Completed → SW-Awaiting AE Assignment → SW-AE Assign Reviewers → SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total resolution time of Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation measured as the duration until the first subsequent human-driven decision point (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed)
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time between Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and SW-Reviewer Agreed in high-performance variants (those with total performance under the median)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time of Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed compared with the time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Declined in the same case trajectories
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
